channel.title: Starting a forum
channel.description: How would I get my forum ranked on google like is there any tricks I can do

item.title: Starting a forum
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

http://googlewebmastercentral.blogspot.com/2009/09/google-does-not-use-keywords-meta-tag.html
Here’s something interesting that’s relevant to your question.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting a forum
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Google rankings have very little to do with things like meta-tags these days, precisely because every idiot and his dog manipulated them in order to achieve higher ranking.
Instead it’s content driven and network driven. If your website has good unique content then it will receive a higher ranking. If it is linked to from lots of sites with good unique content then it will receive a higher ranking.

Using tricks, such as large blocks of unrelated content that are hidden on the page through the use of CSS, typically incurs a punishment in terms of ranking. However various reasonable activities can be performed to bolster ranking, such as using human-readable URLs (instead of something like this: http://web-talk.co.uk/index.php/topic,5.msg5.html?PHPSESSID=7d764799d14d7f51a44e04bc5b34958a#new)

What do you mean you have 300k visitors? There’s no way 300k people have stopped by your site when it only has a handful of posts.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting a forum
item.dc:creator: @mattr91 mattr91
item.description:
@mattr91 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:538378”][quote author=mattr91 link=topic=657204.msg4396723#msg4396723 date=1389363774]
How would I get my forum ranked on google like is there any tricks I can do
[/quote]
Pay money. Get SEO tools. Advertise.[/quote]

Already done that the site is fully Optimize and has over 300k visitors hitting it to boost my domain rank but I cant find it on any serch engine using my keywords only if I type the web address.
This is a report I got from a seo below

After studying your metatags we have the following advice:
Title: The website has a good title. Feel free to use up to 100 characters.
This tag contains 83 characters.
Title relevancy to page content is excellent. 100%
Description: The website has a good meta description tag. Feel free to use up to 200 characters.
This tag contains 200 characters.
Description relevancy to page content is excellent. .
The Description relevancy to page content is 100% .
Keywords: You’re using 20 words, that perfect !.
This tag contains 186 characters.
Keywords relevancy to page content is excellent. .
The keywords relevancy to page content is 100% .
Robots: Search engine spider robots are allowed to spider the complete web page.
This tag contains 13 characters.
Author: The value of the author tag is ’ metatags generator ".
This tag is not really required but helps for your (company) name recognition.

Web page analysis.
This page has less than 100 urls and that is good.
This web page contains 67 urls.Some Search Engines have problems with more than 100 urls on a page.
The size of your website is search engine friendly.
The size of the web page is 10252 bytes.
The web page load time is 6.3 seconds.

Read full topic
